website_summaries.verdict: The Apple Mac mini (Late 2012) is Apple's best yet, packing as much punch into its compact chassis as a full-size desktop, and offering the sizable, speedy Fusion drive.
pros: Offers USB 3.0, HDMI, and Thunderbolt ports

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little computer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic desktop PC. It makes almost no noise and can handle two displays very well! The only dislike was that when I upgraded it by adding a hard drive, it was quite challenging to disassemble the entire thing, but it has been rock solid in its operation like a Mac should be, so I am very happy with it. Just FYI order the minimum spec HD and memory and upgrade those yourself. It can save a lot of money! I put 16 GB in this machine and a 500 GB SSD in the second drive bay, and use the 1 TB drive for extra space.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great mini computer for basic home use
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new desktop computer and made the switch from Windows PC to Apple. I really only needed a basic computer for checking email, uploading pics from my camera (not iPhone), updating my resume, and just basic web surfing. Pros: - Easy sync with iPhone, iPad, iPod - Easy setup - I don't have to shut down all the time for updates to take place Cons: - No DVD slot. I know this is old school, but I like to put my pictures on a CD (in addition to saving them in the cloud), but I can't do that with the Mini. I guess I need to get more comfortable with the Cloud - So many updates!
customer_reviews.author: smooshy_mooshy

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Mac Mini, and I'll never buy another Windows based computer ever again. I constantly use it and never have any trouble either from the hardware or software. Pay more upfront for an Apple and you won't regret it later in terms of savings and headaches. I now have 3 Mac Minis and two Windows workstations. Never have any trouble with the Mac's while the Windows workstations are a constant headache. Every time I power up the Windows workstations, I never know what I am going to get. And that comes from someone who has programmed computers for over 20 years now.
customer_reviews.author: JCash

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This model is going great and is almost 6 years old. It has the latest OS that Mac has released. I added an OCZ 128GB flash drive and gave it a fusion drive capability. Mac makes some good products, expensive products, but they last a lot longer than windows products with no rebuild/reimage requirements. I run Fusion on it and can run simultaneously 4 VMs flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Pj & Becky

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy and enjoyed the product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy and enjoyed the product. Everything that's mentioned in the description is in and on the computer. Make sure you have the 16 GB Ram to add in to make the computer faster. Also adding the 1 TB SSD drive will make it even more faster. The CPU can be overclocked, but do at your own risk. I believe AppleCare is offered, but will have to call Apple to get it. Other than that, everything works great and recommend this model. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Yes.  It is still a great buy in winter 2015.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to retain the option of being able to upgrade memory and hard drive if necessary. This unit offers that possibility. The newest Mac Mini does not. I don't fault Apple for that design choice in new models. Probably helps keep prices down lower than they might be otherwise. But I know what I'm getting into. I like this computer a lot. Upgraded memory to 16GB immediately. Installed Win7 Home under Bootcamp on 250GB partition of 1TB HD. Runs solid modeling CAD smoothly. May add second HD for faster boot-> use SSD. Recommend this computer highly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacamo Kornblau

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes, the old is better than the new
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this Mac Mini to use as a music server running FLAC files decoded via Audirvana integer mode output to HDMI into my pre amp. I am disappointed that Apple decided to essentially sunset this nifty product line by saddling the new versions with inferior CPU, as this one is a quad core processor, which I have also upgraded to 16G RAM and a 1T SSD. If you are thinking about getting a Mac Mini as a music server outside of the iTune/MP3 ecosystem and into the world of proper music, I highly recommend finding a remaining new old stock of these quad core Mac Mini's.
customer_reviews.author: Junker 87

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I've been a windows user my entire life, but after Windows 8 release that had to change. I reviewed and check reviews on Mac Os and finally made the jump ( since windows 8 seem to just fall apart). I am happy with my decision. The Mac Mini was delivered on time and was easy to set-up. The OS is great and easy to learn and as an extra i was able to load windows 7 using BootCamp. So now i don't have to give up the few apps that are not on mac OS.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Great little Mac
customer_reviews.text: Nice mixture of style & performance. It's Ok as is but it really helps upgrading it to 16gb ram and adding a SSD. If you can't live without Windows like me, you can use boot camp and install windows 8.1 to it. Hopefully will work with windows 10 too. This model is actually better than the new one released in late 2014. Pros Compact size Sturdy aluminum case. Beautiful. Energy draw is ridiculously low Quiet Great for use as HTPC Work PC: Complex Excel64 bit +50mb files can be handled easily MP3 encoding is fast Cons Not a game PC at all. Barely DX11 early games at minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Love this Computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought the higher end i7 chip and installed 16gig of RAM. i left the standard hard drive and did not install an SSD. I'm very pleased to report that this is one of the fastest machines i've owned. This is my first foray into the Mac family and i couldn't be happier. My wife has since joined the "cult" with her own MacBook Pro. Fast, easy to use, and fun to operate. Can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Crull

customer_reviews.title: the best mac mini ever
customer_reviews.text: the best mac mini ever .... upgradable memory and upgradable harddisk ... and of course the quad core i7 ...
customer_reviews.author: The Surgeon

customer_reviews.title: Good old computer for much less than new
customer_reviews.text: Runs the latest OS (high Sierra). Easy to upgrade the memory. This unit has an i7 processor which runs everything I need. The unit is 5 years old but runs flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Grunberg

customer_reviews.title: Mac Mini
customer_reviews.text: This is my first mac. I got the i7 processor. Happy with the purchase. Added a 2TB external, 16 GB of memory and an external superdrive right away. Happy with the purchase. This is one of the first apple computers that I've found that from a pricing standpoint is nearly at parity with comparable HP and Dell computers. I use this for home photo and video storage and my music collection -- I would recommend this to anyone that is not using the computer for serious video editing.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Vander Meer

customer_reviews.title: Stop The Presses!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Mac owner now. This machine is pretty fast and after I blow the memory out, I will be editing 4K video (using thunderbolt RAID). I really got it to run Pro Tools and it does so with ease. My super workstation is a PC but this Mac mini and the TB RAID make this a viable workstation for both audio and video.
customer_reviews.author: natedogg265

customer_reviews.title: This older version of the Mac Mini is a beast and is the version right before Apple dumbed the machine down
customer_reviews.text: Incredible computer and deal. This older version of the Mac Mini is a beast and is the version right before Apple dumbed the machine down. If you are in the market for a small format quiet mac that has power for days, this is a great way to go.
customer_reviews.author: JOEMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: quadcore is just better - even better compared to the newest version which doesn't have the option of quadcore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mac at a bargain price!
customer_reviews.text: If your thinking of switching from PC to Apple, the Mac Mini is perfect. Since you already have the monitor, keyboard and mouse, save money but don't skimp on quality with this selection. I installed my own "fusion drive" (instructions are online) and after 2.5 years it boots in 10-15 seconds. I'd love to get the new iMac for a FaceTime camera and microphone plus a HD display, but this little gem is just humming away. It was my first foray into Mac and there is a small learning curve but it's pretty easy to navigate. For the questions you'd have, Google is a click away!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan E.

customer_reviews.title: Best Apple Product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. The power of mac in a small size. Easily portable. Many people wonder what it is on my desk and are shocked to find out that it is so powerful. Works wonders with All adobe CS6 programs. The processor is really what sells this bad boy. Highly recommend for those on a budget. Great primary mac.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Make 'Em Like They Used To
customer_reviews.text: They don't make them like this anymore which is why obtaining this version of the Mac Mini is so awesome. It's serving as the brain for my home project studio and I couldn't be happier with it. If you can get your hands on a 2012 Quad Core Mac Mini then don't hesitate. These things are worth it because they can still be customized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one of the best price computers on the market
customer_reviews.text: one of the best price computers on the market you find other computers that are cheeper but this one will hold up to everyday use for years and run windows if you need to actually windows runs better on this machine that a windows machine I have five apples they all talk to each other and its a great system
customer_reviews.author: Tjjelen

customer_reviews.title: Small and neat
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Mac user since 1985 with my first owned Mac a dual floppy Mac SE. This is the 9th Mac and it is a beauty. As I had already owned keyboard, mouse, drives, monitor, printer, scanner etc. This Mac mini slot onto my desk and was up and running in minutes. I highly recommend this Mac mini but also recommend you upgrade the memory if you are a high end user, i.e. Photoshop, video editing etc.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B. Scholl

customer_reviews.title: Apple PC
customer_reviews.text: I could write 20 pages on how awesome and reliable this pc is across the board. Amazing capabilities and crazy compact unit. Best option if you already have a good monitor and don't need a package system IMO. Apple's OS and hardware is rock solid reliability.
customer_reviews.author: KGB

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: Great little computer, especially once you upgrade the drive with an SSD. Once I did that, it ran everything I threw at it with no problems. As with all things apple, there isn't much that is user-upgradeable. The memory can be replaced, and the hard drive as well. If you want to add a SuperDrive (ssd/hdd combo) you'll have to do some research beforehand, and get some special tools.
customer_reviews.author: Tall n' Geeky

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but Apple hardware isn't what it used to be...
customer_reviews.text: Apple hardware used to be nearly bulletproof, not anymore. The SD card reader stopped working, and the audio doesn't work if you unplug and replug - have to reboot. I got it because it was quiet and small. It's a pain in the rear end to add storage, need to buy a kit and everything. But it is possible to add the second hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: fliqtr

customer_reviews.title: Great computer, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I researched tons of computers and couldn't find any that had specs like the Mac Mini for the price. The unit is solid and feels very sturdy! Very quiet unit (use mine for recording). I wish the internal hard drive was 7200rpm, but I have not had any issues with the slower 5400rpm. I updated my recording computer with 16 GB of ram and this computer screems!! No complaints on this computer at all! I'm glad and very happy I made the switch to the Apple!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine arrived quickly. Took off the bottom plate no dust very clean no scratches. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: StreetReportPodcast

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase of 2012 for me! The power of this little guy is crazy for it's footprint and power usage. Completely quiet and just awesome. I would highly recommend putting the Corsair Vengeance 16gb kit in it. Max the sucker out and screams. From there if ya want, throw a SSD in it and then it will be insanely quick.
customer_reviews.author: EJ255

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best computer I bought.
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best computer I bought. - Solid performance - Strong Mac OS X - Easy to use - It runs spectacularly right out of the box - I upgrade the RAM to 16GB with Crucial memory kit (DYI , very easy to do !!) """ Simplemente la mejor computadora que he comprado """
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Munoz

customer_reviews.title: GET THE LATE 2012 NOT THE 2014!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely smashing machine! This one is MUCH better than the high end 2014! Those ones are tested at 40% LESS EFFICIENT than this upgraded with 16gb of RAM and an upgraded HDD (with space for another SSD!!) Highly recommend this model as a nice desktop production or editing studio brain!
customer_reviews.author: jwhitty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller and machine is in very good shape
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller and machine is in very good shape. Using it pretty much daily and its working like a charm. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure I will ever buy a desktop that is not a mac mini. This computer benchmarks at speeds similiar to the Mac Pro's that are 4-8 times the cost. Granted it does have less feature but the processor is speedy and the memory is user friendly to upgrade. The Fusion Drive is fantastic. HDMI out is a great feature although Apple should have added it years ago. I have this computer driving two monitors in my office where I run parallels and trading software all day.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor T

customer_reviews.title: i7! Thunderbolt!  MAC!!! YES!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first Mac I've ever purchased, and I couldn't be happier with it. I've held out this long because I never agreed with their high prices, but this one fit my budget like a glove! It is so much computing power in such a tiny package! I'm waiting on my RAM upgrades and SSD kit to arrive in the mail, and then this computer will be even more powerful and faster, something I can barely imagine! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Norkevicus

customer_reviews.title: Dont let the size fool ya
customer_reviews.text: I did tons of research on what new computer to buy and finally decided on the mac mini 2.3 i7. I have it Hooked up to a Lenovo 27in IPS Monitor via HDMI and upgraded it to 16 gigs of ram. I couldn't be happier. I use photoshop and illustrator a lot and cs6 runs great on this little mac. It is very fast and I am VERY HAPPY with my mac MINI
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start. I have never liked Apple computers until now because of software availability. I was forced to purchase this so that I no longer had to use a hackintosh for iOS development. After I purchased this though, I can't speak highly enough of it. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an aged Macbook Pro. I upgraded the RAM to 8GB on purchase and am quite pleased with the performance. I like that I can upgrade the HDs in the future if needed. The computer takes up very little space on my desk and runs clean and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mac!
customer_reviews.text: I have an iMac at my office and wanted to be able to work from home as well. I purchased this Mac Mini without a monitor and was incredibly pleased to see the display when I hooked it up to my 65" Plasma TV in the living room. I can sit back and work from home in my easy chair as though I was at my office.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Small and expandable enough
customer_reviews.text: Easiest, cheapest way to get a fast desktop map. I paired this with a couple nice 27" monitors, extra DRAM, 128GB SSD drive and a USB 3.0 hub on Amazon and a and the expansion kit from iFixIt and I now have a super fast Mac that's much better than my 3 year old iMac.
customer_reviews.author: Hanko

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought this model when I did - it ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this model when I did - it was my primary non-work computer for two years, and now has a macbook pro companion.
customer_reviews.author: bsb

customer_reviews.title: These I7 Mini's are great small computers.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Had it checked out by Apple Repair Station. Every was OK.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: What a speedy computer
customer_reviews.text: I've just bought it to use instead my old 2007 macbook. What a difference ! Wonderful aluminium design, great silence during use, and faster than the lightning ! It take now less than a minute to load into iphoto 1000 pictures. I recommend therefore to buy an extra memory of 16 gb to use instead the limited amount of 4 gb. Thanks Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I generally love apple devices. All what this need is the additional HDD install kit and 120GB SSD, 16GB RAM and you have a great small size desktop that is ultra fast
customer_reviews.author: H. S. AL-HAYKI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Mac Mini. These have been my favorite computers. (I purchased my first PC back in 1983 so I've had a few computers.) One downside is that I needed to purchase a separate CD/DVD unit, but that only set me back about $100--no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Stan57Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: What a nice little machine this is. Extremely quiet and small, and with the extra RAM able to run windows and OS/X on the same box. Perfect to unclutter my desk a bit, and believe me I needed that!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Knox

customer_reviews.title: Older model 2.6GHz quad rocks
customer_reviews.text: The quad mini came as described. Awesome to have the bonus upgrade! The speed increase and extra ram has been great. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Mini to be an iTunes media streamer for our home, and for managing our ever-growing archive of photos and videos. Works great! As expected.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Farnham

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Product,  Value for Mac
customer_reviews.text: Mac is known for two things, Quality and Expensive. I have purchased many Mac Mini's in the past, this obviously being the best of all. With it you can experience working on a Mac, converting your TV into a media center, at 1/2 price of iMac desktop. Its nice to have 1TB hard drive, but if you don't plan on storing much consider purchasing a SSD hard drive and an extra 16GB of ram, and you will make this computer fly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a Christmas gift for my son. He ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. He absolutely loves it. It does everything, and more, that he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Woods

customer_reviews.title: Quad-core performance at low cost
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, and the only way to obtain a quad-core Mac Mini because Apple's latest refresh of the Mini offers only dual-core options.
customer_reviews.author: Photo/Video Gearhead

customer_reviews.title: Works Great as a DAW with Logic Pro X
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend the Mac Mini with Logic Pro X as a lower cost alternative to the iMac and Pro Tools. It provides a lot of creative functionality for less than half the cost for anyone who is getting into music recording and production and does not need a high-end, high-cost DAW.
customer_reviews.author: Ron, Florida

customer_reviews.title: photos and this thing is nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: I swapped the RAM for 16 GB and this is a powerhouse now. I run several VMs, edit videos, photos and this thing is nice and quiet. One of the best purchase I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Balaji Natarajan

customer_reviews.title: WOW.
customer_reviews.text: I just installed it and have been using it for a couple of hours, and I am blown away. I can't wait to install the 16GB of ram and the new SSD drive. I will update this in a few months from now.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great solid computer
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing and fast! Yes, fast enough for iOS development. However, if you are the type of person that needs portability, don't get this; just invest in a macbook pro. If you love a desktop computer and don't need a CD/DVD drive, this is a solid, small and fast computer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thorson

customer_reviews.title: Little package packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite personal computer yet. So easy to use and so many options not found on windows products. Buying the mini gives you the control over what type of mouse, keyboard and monitor you want to use. Rather than a company giving you i/o products you do like or want.
customer_reviews.author: HowieII

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase of a Great System at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great system. Very compact and powerful. Works extremely well and a very good value. Does everything my old Mac did and much more.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Greene

customer_reviews.title: I love my MAC Mini,....!!!
customer_reviews.text: First time MAC user! Years of using PC's, I would say both have advantages, but overall I'm enjoying the MAC more. Although it does take a little getting used to. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Fast, small and performs incredibly quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I love my mac mini, As soon as I received the unit I upgraded the ram to 8gb and it provides tremendous performance when using final cut pro and iMovie programs. Like all Apple products this unit is a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer. I loaded Windows 7 and am utilizing ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome computer. I loaded Windows 7 and am utilizing this as a media PC. The speed & size make this perfect for a media center application.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Heck

customer_reviews.title: No concerns
customer_reviews.text: Fine little machine. Very pleased with the purchase and had no issues with the one from whom I purchased it. Exactly what I was looking for. Great communication from seller, shipped out promptly. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great form factor computer.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's an Apple! It just works! Seriously, I love the form factor. Nice and small and perfect as a media server in my RV.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Newest version as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The computer is the newest model, as advertised. The ad incorrectly states that it comes with Lion ( which is an older operating system). It actually came preloaded with the newest operating system (which, at the time of my purchase was latest version of Mavericks). Great computer!
customer_reviews.author: Loren Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my friend and he loves it no probe he said
customer_reviews.author: Turbo

customer_reviews.title: Better than the NEW VERSION
customer_reviews.text: Better than the new ones. I popped in a SSD and loaded to capacity with RAM.
customer_reviews.author: WillyBBB

customer_reviews.title: Runs Windows like a Boss!
customer_reviews.text: Best desktop ever! I run WIN7 via Bootcamp and it boots in a fraction of the time my two Dell PCs require. Small, silent, fast! What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Tigrepants

customer_reviews.title: Love this little Mac
customer_reviews.text: I bought the MacMini to replace a iMac. The mini now has a SSD and a HDD, lots of RAM, and is blazing fast. Not a good computer for games, but everything else works great.
customer_reviews.author: kip-CL

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered with good condition. It functions well as expected
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered with good condition. It functions well as expected. Everything's good but price. It's a little bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jae-wan Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mac is Best choice! Then increase memory to 16 gigabytes.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Zavoda

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I happy whit this Mac, because it has excellent preformance. Its simple amazing... The quallity of graphics, and the speed of system. It work so good whit a diferents displays, like a proyectors or desktop displays.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Brenes

customer_reviews.title: Best Computer Ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is the best, by far, all-purpose, reliable, silent, compact, affordable, super fast computer I have ever bought or used..period.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Apple Mac Mini
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a present for someone overseas. Absolutely no problem with 220/50 current. Works fine It replaced an old one. Info transferred fine
customer_reviews.author: Caryl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Mac Mini still runs great and I've had zero problems. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Loving my Mac Mini
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled that I purchased my Mac Mini, I have not had the chance to learn the whole machine but what I have learned so far I am happy that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats a Mac
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Mac Mini I've owned. The other 2 were G4 PowerPC machines from 2005. Except for a hard drive that I had to replace in the 1.25GHz machine, they are both running fine. I needed the new Mac because some software won't run on the OS X 10.4.11.
customer_reviews.author: Cable Guy

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade the RAM and throw a SSD at it!
customer_reviews.text: 4GB of RAM is about enough to boot up and run one app at a time. The stock drive is nicely sized, but I feel that adding a SSD really woke the machine up. I threw in a 256GB Corsair M4 and 16GB from Kingston with both being on sale I nabbed them for under $200. This thing feels several times faster than my SSD equipped 2008 Mac Pro (8 cores, 16GB ram). Quiet as a mouse. The perfect computer between a laptop and a big multi monitor Mac Pro setup.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your existing components are compatible before you make the leap
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I got an iPhone I have loved apple. Next came the iPad. And the Mac mini made our home complete. I did read a PC user transiting to apple "dummies" book to learn the ins and outs. The down side: my beloved Cannon printer doesn't have apple drivers, my web cam was not compatible, and I had to get a new key board (the last one I anticipated). For some reason my el cheapo external drive did work; I had guessed that it wouldn't. Overall it is great; not having drivers for the printer kills me but I can't blame apple for that.
customer_reviews.author: T. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Such an amazing computer in such a small, elegant, case. If you're a fan of Apple products this one is certainly a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Mclaurin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Mac Mini
customer_reviews.text: I really love this new Mac Mini. It's way faster than my old quad-core Mac Pro. Nice product from the people at Apple.
customer_reviews.author: ampedup

customer_reviews.title: Can you beat this deal?
customer_reviews.text: A great bargain. Arrived in perfect shape. Works flawlessly. The last of the Intel i7 4-core chips w/ 16GB ram and 2 HDDs. Includes Lion server. All for $800.
customer_reviews.author: MARK BLAIR RALSTON

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Easy , fast and everything works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Ali A.

customer_reviews.title: Well done.
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding computers. Very flexible and adaptable. Well designed.
customer_reviews.author: W. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: i love these machine!
customer_reviews.text: i love these machine, its very fast, easy to install every where, its very quiet, a lot of input output options (dvi, hdmi) i love these mac
customer_reviews.author: bernardo posada

customer_reviews.title: The Mighty Mini
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid computer that we use to host our website and our FileMaker Pro Server. It does a mighty job in its mini package.
customer_reviews.author: Music Man

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Nothing much to say about the computer, it works as well as I expected. The frustration free packaging is perfect. I was thinking to keep the box just to use in case I have to move or similar.
customer_reviews.author: Sorellana1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love That !!! it is working great since I got.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio Luis C. Amorim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: What to say about Apple product? Excellent. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo da Silva

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for over a year and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Shavers

customer_reviews.title: awesome computer
customer_reviews.text: this is a fast, well built machine. I bought the 16gb crucial ram with it and I think it was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Caleb C. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Everything just works perfectly. Perfect size and has everything that you need to conduct work and school. Amazing value and this product will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Pabon, Al

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product, very solid, easy to use, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I was a Windows user and bought this to replace and old pc used as a media center and I can say it overpassed my expectations. The hardware is very solid, nice looking and silent (which is important in a HTPC). The OS also is very good, easy to use and stable. My next acquisition will be a notebook (also replace an old one) and I'm sure it will be a MacBook Pro.
customer_reviews.author: GUSTAVO C VERGOLINO

customer_reviews.title: The best Mac Mini to date...
customer_reviews.text: The best Mac Mini Apple made (so far) - so glad I found one new!
customer_reviews.author: wjcurtis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was always dubious about buying the Mac Mini, but I don't regret this purchase. The machine is very stable and surprised me when I played music on it! :P
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: After 3 days, setting the MINI and my SONY hdtv, researching and making phone calls trying to get the best answers about picture quality; all I have to say...IT IS THE BEST ! i ENJOYED THE PROCESS ! I am using my tv as a computer monitor, a SONY KDL-55EX620, of course I ug the memory to 16gb...should I say something else??
customer_reviews.author: Dante Iglesias

customer_reviews.title: Power in a small footprint
customer_reviews.text: I was delightfully surprised that this little Mac has a performance comparable to an iMac or desktop PC. I thought it would perform on the same level as a laptop since my experience with laptops is given to performance that's below desktops of similar specifications.
customer_reviews.author: Peters

customer_reviews.title: sometimes screen goes out and comes back in but I ...
customer_reviews.text: sometimes screen goes out and comes back in but I looked it us i think its a flaw in apple
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best media center solution on the market. As a little more memory and this thing hums.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Mac Mini Desktop
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a much larger system. I like that this takes up only a small space on my desk top. The Mac is so different from my PC that it takes some time to get used to it. It is fast and very responsive. The hardest part of making the change was saving everything on my old computer to the Mac Mini. I made a folder for all of my old files. I like the picture recognition system.
customer_reviews.author: DorisDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Great little computer
customer_reviews.text: It is a little pricey however it works great and has met all of our expectations. It is probably 1/20 the size of the Mac Pro that it replaced and amazingly more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Apple Mac Mini
customer_reviews.text: As with almost Apple products I have purchased since the 1980's, it has met all of my expectations. It could use a couple more ports, but hubs solve that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Davis Mantai

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the money
customer_reviews.text: This Apple Mac Mini is a great computer. It shipped quickly and arrived when expected. If you're looking for a great compact computer, you might want to consider a Mac Mini.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: light, silent, portable, fast and upgradable. Better with the 16gig ram upgrade. So far so good. I guess that this new "sealed" and hard to upgrade IMac, makes the mini a more affordable and versatile option.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo V. P. OLIVEIRA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time and looks great. Got this 2 years ago
customer_reviews.author: Erik
